definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The first angel sounded his trumpet, and there came hail and fire mixed with blood, and it was hurled down upon the earth.
sentences.chinese: 第一位天使吹號，就有雹子與火攙着血丟在地上。

sentences.english: Hailstones were rattling on the roofs.
sentences.chinese: 雹子打在屋頂上乒乓亂響。
高射炮火像雹子般轟擊飛機。

sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天，一場雹子把那十畝好地全給損壞了。

sentences.english: After the first trumpet came hail and fire mixed with blood.
sentences.chinese: 第一號帶來雹子與火攙着血。

sentences.english: It was so fine this morning. Who would have thought it would hail in the afternoon!
sentences.chinese: 早上天氣還好好的，不料下午竟下起雹子來了。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
to rumble with thunder/clap of thunder
goose feather snow (idiom)/big heavy snow fall
